chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This chapter introduces a list of selected topics which you may encounter when managing the &ceph; environment. To every topic there is a recommended solution that helps you understand or fix the existing problem. The topics are sorted into relevant categories.

sect1.title: Reporting Software Problems
sect1.para: If you come across a problem when running &productname; &productnumber; related to some of its components, such as &ceph;, &rgw;, or Calamari, report the problem to SUSE Technical Support. The recommended way is with the supportconfig utility.

tip.para: Because supportconfig is modular software, make sure that the supportutils-plugin-ses package is installed.
